pixelLoader.colored_block.tip: right-click to open disabled blocks list
pixelLoader.colored_block.load: shift right-click to load color space
pixelLoader.colored_block.place: shift right-click a block to place color space
pixelLoader.colored_block.needload: please use the color space loader to load the available color space first
pixelLoader.noFile: no pictures selected, shift right-click to select one
pixelLoader.fileNotFind: no pictures found in the img folder
pixelLoader.imgLoader.tip:
Right click to open settings
Shift right-click or right-click a block to select the picture
Shift right-click a block to start generating
